attr.title: The Starlit Escape
attr.desc: The Starlit Escape! A Game Boy style Metroidvania about exploring a haunted space station and meeting ghosts along the way! Made in the month of October for Halloween
attr.inst: Download game (windows ver) from https://xjackfox.itch.io/the-starlit-escape,  copy all filles except the .exe to /ports/thestarlitescape/gamedata
